wiki.content:
"Welcome to the Jungle" is the first track from Guns N' Roses' debut album, Appetite for Destruction, and also on their Greatest Hits album. The song peaked at number seven on the Billboard Hot 100, becoming their first significant hit single.
 
 The song was written by lead singer Axl Rose and was inspired by an encounter he had when first moving to L.A. someone walked up to him and said  "You know where you are? You're in the jungle baby, you're gonna die!"
 
 Not really.  What actually happened was that Slash, came p with a riff and Axl had lyrics that popped into his head, so he started singing them.  This is according to Slash in his book.  
 
 This song appeared on Guitar Hero 3.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Welcome to the Jungle" is the first track from Guns N' Roses' debut album, Appetite for Destruction, and also on their Greatest Hits album. The song peaked at number seven on the Billboard Hot 100, becoming their first significant hit single.  The song was written by lead singer Axl Rose and was inspired by an encounter he had when first moving to L.A. someone walked up to him and said  "You know where you are? You're in the jungle baby, you're gonna die!"

track.name: Welcome to the Jungle
comments: all props to the band that blew Bon Jovi and their ilk out of the water, Axl and Slash wasted a lot of other ppl's careers !
You can have anything you want, but you better not take it from me
One of the best albums ever made.
DO YOU KNOW WHERE YOU ARE? YOU IN THE JUNGLE BABY, YOU GONNA DIE!
i'm in the jungle when i listen this song :D
damn right you in the jungle baby

YOU KNOW WHERE YOU ARE?!  

Love this track...love this band.
You"re in the jungle baby,You"re gonna diiieeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
